about_the_game:
Cultivate your own virtual garden in Seeds, a relaxing and rewarding idle game. Start with a humble patch of land and a few precious seeds. Plant them, watch them grow, and reap the rewards! Each plant you harvest is a valuable item, with varying rarities from common to epic, all ready to be traded on the Steam Marketplace.

Key Features:
  • Simple, Idle Gameplay: Plant your seeds and watch them grow while you're away!
  • Collect Valuable Plants: Discover a variety of plants, each with its own rarity and value.
  • Trade on the Steam Marketplace: Sell your harvested plants or buy new seeds to expand your garden.
  • Regular Rewards: Return every 2.5 hours to collect a new seed and keep your farm thriving.

Seeds is perfect for players who enjoy:
  • Idle games with a simple, rewarding loop
  • Collecting and trading unique items
  • Relaxing gameplay with a touch of strategy

Start your journey today and build your own garden in Seeds!

Each plant you harvest is a valuable item, with varying rarities from common to epic, all ready to be traded on the Steam Marketplace.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Seeds

short_description: Plant seeds, and reap valuable plants in this relaxing idle game. Collect rare varieties and build your virtual garden empire, then sell your bountiful harvest on the Steam Marketplace!
